Text:
This torrent is spam. It's 4 pages of the most obvious stuff everybody already knows, some stuff that is dumb and incorrect, and plugs trying to get you to visit some sex-oriented web sites. Avoid downloading it. In fact, if you click the link to the guy who added it, all 6 of his uploads are dating guides that are nearly the exact same size. This is because they're the same guide with different names.

About half the items on PB related to dating are spam. Please notify others via comments if this is the case to save everyone time and effort, and to discourage spammers from trying it. Also delete them from your downloads so you don't become a seeder of them.
